mapper.select: select fromCity,toCity,railway_city.tonnage,railway_city.carNum,c1.longitude,c1.latitude,c2.longitude,c2.latitude,benefit FROM railway_city left join city as c1 on railway_city.fromCity=c1.name left join city as c2 on railway_city.toCity=c2.name where fromCity like CONCAT('%',#{fromCity},'%') and toCity like CONCAT('%',#{toCity},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into railway_city(fromCity,toCity,tonnage,carNum,benefit) (select fromCity,toCity,sum(tonnage),sum(carNum),sum(carNum)/sum(tonnage) from railwaydata group by fromCity,toCity)
